body:
Mr. President, while campaigning you stated that you would oppose the slaughter of US horses; however, the budget you signed off on last year reinstated the option of funding horse slaughter in this country.  

To correct your error, please sign an executive order that makes it illegal to slaughter any horse in the US, and prohibits exporting US horses for slaughter.
title: Stop the slaughter of US equines (horses, mules, and donkeys).
